other_title: Edgar de la Cambriole : Le complot du clan Fûma (French)
Lupin III : Le complot du clan Fûma (French)
Lupin III: La cospirazione dei Fuma (Italian)
Lupin III: Plot of the Fuma Clan
Rupan Sansei: Fuma Ichizoku no Imboo (Japanese)
ルパン三世　風魔一族の陰謀 (Japanese)
怪盜魯邦三世 風魔一族的陰謀 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Goemon's wedding to Murasaki Inabe, daughter of a samurai clan's leader, is interrupted when the Fuma ninjas attack, kidnapping the bride-to-be and demanding her family's ancient treasure as ransom. Lupin, Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko work together once again to try to save Murasaki and get to the treasure before the Fuma can steal it.
